# Generated by `boostdep --cmake spawn`
# Copyright 2020 Peter Dimov
# Distributed under the Boost Software License, Version 1.0.
# https://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.5...3.16)

project(boost_spawn VERSION "${BOOST_SUPERPROJECT_VERSION}" LANGUAGES CXX)

add_library(boost_spawn INTERFACE)
add_library(Boost::spawn ALIAS boost_spawn)

target_include_directories(boost_spawn INTERFACE include)

target_link_libraries(boost_spawn
  INTERFACE
    Boost::asio
    Boost::context
    Boost::optional
    Boost::system
    Boost::type_traits
)

if(BUILD_TESTING AND EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/test/CMakeLists.txt")

  add_subdirectory(test)

endif()
